#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define LL long long
const int MAXN = 1e5 + 10;
const LL MOD = 1e9 + 7;
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n,k;
        cin>>n>>k;
        int ans = 0;
        for(int i = 1;i <= n;++i){
            int x;
            cin>>x;
            if((x + k)%7 == 0)
                ++ans;
        }
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
